title: GIM Tracker v0.0.2
description: Welcome to the official alpha release of GIM Tracker. Track your ironman progress, set goals, and collaborate with your team.

title: Online User Fix
description: Fixed a bug where you could not see users online.

title: How to Get Started
description: Create or join a team from the Team tab. Set personal and team goals in the Goals tab. Track your gear progression in the Gear tab.
